couponTitle: Get Up To $150 Off Your Rona Order
couponDescription: At Rona we value your loyalty and want to reward you for shopping with us. We're offering a tiered discount structure that allows you to save more when you buy more. When you spend $300 or more on regular-priced items, we'll knock off $50 from your total. If your order totals $500 or more, we'll deduct $100. And if you make a purchase of $750 or more, we'll take a full $150 off. Don't forget to use this promo code at checkout.
